knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r load-packages, message=TRUE, warning=TRUE, paged.print=TRUE}
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
```

```{r import data}
trade <- read_stata("us_trade_data.dta")
trade$trade_type[trade$trade_type == "Total Exports"] <- "Export" 
trade$trade_type[trade$trade_type == "Total Imports"] <- "Import" 
head(trade,10)
```
```{r create tible}
trade_1 <- trade %>%
  filter(is.na(trade_value) == FALSE) %>% 
  group_by(year, trade_type) %>%
  summarize(trade_value = mean(trade_value)) %>%
  pivot_wider(id_cols = year, names_from = trade_type, values_from = trade_value) 

trade_1$Net_Import = trade_1$Import-trade_1$Export
head(trade_1,10)
```

```{r line graph}
ggplot(data = trade_1, aes(year)) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = Export, colour = "blue")) + 
  geom_line(aes(y = Import, colour = "read"))
```

```{r bar graph}
ggplot(data=trade_1, aes(x=year, y=Net_Import)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", fill="steelblue")+
  theme_minimal()
```


```{r create tible3}
trade_2 <- trade %>%
  filter(is.na(trade_value) == FALSE, year == 2018) %>% 
  group_by(year, trade_type, state) %>%
  summarize(trade_value = mean(trade_value)) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = trade_type, values_from = trade_value) 

trade_2$Net_Import = trade_2$Import-trade_2$Export
head(trade_2,10)
```
```{r install}
install.packages("usmap",repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
library(usmap)
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r create map}
plot_usmap(regions = "state", data = trade_2, values = "Export", color = "red") + 
  scale_fill_continuous(name = "U.S Exports(2019)", label = scales::comma) + 
  theme(legend.position = "right")
plot_usmap(regions = "state", data = trade_2, values = "Import", color = "red") + 
  scale_fill_continuous(name = "U.S Exports(2019)", label = scales::comma) + 
  theme(legend.position = "right")
```
